title: NIDALEE IN EVERY SINGLE GAME
body:
IS ANYONE ELSE SICK OF THIS PLEB CHAMP?? Being played nons-stop because of her broken ass being the fastest thing since usain bolt with an ability to throw trucks at you. When is this champ being toned down to the point where she doesn't make me feel like giving up on league because of the pleb! Boring ass champ which is broken with little counter isn't fun playing with. It's funny how her kit change was meant to make it so she has to either fully engage or disengage rather than being always safe and risk-free. . I don't see the part where she isn't like that now?? She can throw spears all day long and have no counterplay.. Oh you tried to engage her? She will pull you to her nexus before you catch her.. Lock down doesn't work on her, she just jumps out and heals. There is little threat to the aboriginidalee. 

Yeah I might be over the top with this post but gosh I am sick to death of this champ being in every game let alone every lcs game. Maokai/rumble/nidalee/lee-sin/ kalista/annie/ zed gosh i am sick of seeing these champs in lcs. I don't even watch the game if more than 2 of these champs are played. Absolutely sick of seeing the same game. It is stale. I think the food at the back of my cupboard is more fresh than half of these matches. Maybe instead of nerfing everything, bring older champs BACK up to speed.. idk anymore. These nerfs are becoming messy that's for sure.

I'm more sick of kat leblanc and zed, being a mid main and all.

Oh and xerath's Q cooldown is still pretty cancer but at least he's relatively rare these days.


actually nah nidalee can diaf too I just remembered the last time I had to face her mid, her spears were hitting me literally on the other side of minions, she would throw it at me down lane, I would walk to the opposite side of the approaching casters, then I would get magically chunked by magic even though it was a) visually missing (but normal for the broke ass hitboxes it has) and b) having a minion directly between me and it.

She's "risk-free" in the same way Akali is "risk-free" 1v1, yes there is almost no risk because she can kill you before you can do anything about it. But in a group, she can't. Which is when her bullsht spear come into play. They are still bullsht.

Pre-rework, they used to do 3/4 of your HP per spear and Riot said, ok thats crap, we will nerf her. It still does like half a carries HP in one spear. 1/2 hp from 1 long range ability is still bullsht.

I know you can't nerf the damage, because then Nid would be dropped. Maybe make the spear slower. Or make it do less damage, but the same damage it does now but only if the target is hunted, forcing her to use her traps if she wants long range spear damage.
